entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xcode local build failure: xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode, but active developer directory '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' is a command line tools instance #102471
  • MeterListener continues to receive measurements after Dispose #102465
    Future
  • Standard FixedArray types in BCL? #102462
  • ReadOnlySequence<byte>.PositionOf Error #102457
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.Repeat (instance method) #102454
  • C# .NET Framework issue WinHttpException: Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR #102452
  • Creating a ZIP is incompatible with ASP.NET asynchronous I/O #102450
  • Slow Ping Class #102445
  • HttpClient doesn't support proxy server in HTTPS protocol in Linux #102441
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterSampleCalculatorTests.CounterSampleCalculator_ElapsedTime #102429

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add collection builders for frozen collection types #92190
    9.0.0
  • Name of WebAssembly tools in VS setup doesn't deliniate what a versionless description is #93314
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads for existing params T[] overloads #77873
    9.0.0
  • Using Visual Studio for Managed Code #101035
  • [browser][MT] mono_download_assets - RangeError: Start offset -1 is outside the bounds of the buffer #102196
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphism Type Discriminator Not Deserialized #102455
  • [wasm] `Assertion: should not be reached at D:/a/_work/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:93` in `System.Reflection.Tests` #95805
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] Force short date pattern to use yyyy #99515
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: ilverify\\ILVerificationTests.cmd #102428
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonPropertyFlag to System.Text.Json.Serialization to signal Property existence in Deserialize objects. #102186
  • Support for JsonSerializerContext inheritance in source generation with JsonTypeInfo reuse #101663
  • CancelPendingFlushDuringBackpressureThrows test fails on arm32 #102378
  • ConcurrentDictionary<TKey,TValue> When key is delegate, `AddOrUpdate` was wrong #102448
  • Prompt signature do not match when Emit implements the method with `in` keyword in the parameter #102430
  • .Net 8 -> Killing entire tree not working using Process.Kill(true) #102442
  • Reevaluate `params ReadOnlySpan<string>` overloads from #77873 #101261
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode #102473
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update version of code coverage report generator #102472
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix VS debugger issues with funceval and secondary threads #102470
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • LSRA: Refactor some of the methods around creating kill set #102469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Releveling CrstDynamicMT and CrstCodeVersioning to fix a stress bug. #102468
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP][Apple-Mobile][HybridGlobalization] Fix DatePattern formats + add new tests #102464
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: Move backward jumps to before their successors after RPO-based layout #102461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2
  • Modify error message for failed RW mappings #102458
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Bucket failing Xml trimming test apps #102449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Add FrozenSet.Create collection builder #102223
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Switch off HybridGlobalization lane on v8 on CI #102447
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add version to newest VS tools description #102446
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • Fix flaky Json+Pipe test #102412
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Check for newlines in email address. #102311
    area-System.Net
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Delete empty DebugType property from test projects #102422
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix few gcc build warnings for RISC-V #102426
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Migrate to zlib-ng #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #102346
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #102397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update .gitattributes #100736
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, 9.0.0
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add `SetEntryAssembly()` API to `System.Reflection` #102271
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #102345
    area-codeflow
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Fix description discovery for `wasm-experimental` workload #102367
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ability to dump ILLink traces for all tests #102409
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Make ToDictionary() selectors parallel. #100590
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 2 #102297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.60, windows: 125.0.6422.60 #102417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • Cleanup CoreLib CompatibilitySuppressions #102363
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle missing HTTP3 error cases #101923
    area-System.Net.Http
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete DebugSymbols=true setting for the repo build #102392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • Uninstalling .NET SDK 8.0.300 left empty directory that caused "[MSB4236] The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found." #41022
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk unable to authenticate to private DevOps NPM feed since 0.5.105-alpha #41017

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]Runing project failed with net9 preview 4 sdk after allowEnforceSignCI policy enabled. #41010

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #41031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip Test Blocking Codeflow #41029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41026
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #41016
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use exclusions that contain "src/<repo>" #41028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Flow through generated container image names to callers #41027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow through generated container image names to callers #40638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport PR to use latest MSBuild on core #40883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Update internal mac pool image label #40999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40932
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Include location for required member missing error #73596
  • Visual Studio only detects problems on build #73585
  • Intellisense hover for suggestions, missing assembly references not working #73584
  • Serializable exception proposed by visual studio in dotnet 8 #73583
  • Rename does not work for C# class name in VS 17.9.6 #73582
  • Generate Constructor Quick Action doesn't work on Primary Constructors #73581
  • Refactoring ""Extract Method" when a primary constructor property is in the extracted code sends primary constructor property in as a method parameter #73580
  • Consider having constructors automatically inherit documentation from the containing type #73579
  • Remove NETSDK1206 from NoWarn #73578

Closed

  • Interface-Method: IsSealed does not work as expected #73441
  • Type arguments are not being inferred correctly from method group #73347
  • Possibly unintended reuse of `ref` local to `in`/`ref readonly` parameters causes unexpected mutation #73438
  • Using CompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync there are a lot of xmlExceptions #58589
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue where we might run code in the lightbulb post-disposal #73604
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update compiler version #73602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove addOperationsScope as it wasn't being used anywhere #73601
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only fetch options if needed #73600
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compute classifications for FAR results in parallel. #73599
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Updated projects #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove unnecesary code #73594
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Merged

  • Comment out unused telemtry id #73597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Partial properties: misc compiler layer work #73527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Remove 'flavors' from FAR results #73592
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a List as the backing store for the FAR window from an ImmutableList. #73589
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include sqlite binaries to enable persistent storage in vscode #70162
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch FAR data from an immutable dictionary to an immutable array #73587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Check language version for more ref-struct-interfaces scenarios #73586
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md for Ref Struct Interfaces #73588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [17.10] Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73572
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove dependency on all Roslyn assemblies from build host #73497
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2456069 #73415
    auto-merge
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose `OutputCachePolicyBuilder.AddPolicy(IOutputCachePolicy)` as `public` #55809
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #55808
  • Upgraded to .net core 8.0 and now app_offline.htm to shutdown the app pool for code deployment hangs. #55807
  • [OutputCaching] `OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices` is always `null` during initialization #55805
  • .Net 5 losing HttpContext #55806
  • Blazor Identity and LocalStorage with InteractiveRenderMode #55799
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries, plaintext #55785
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #55784
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55790
  • restore fails #55795
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, updates #55788

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #55811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Remove unnecessary pragmas #55810
    needs-area-label
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5 #55800
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #55759
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.6
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #55758
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • Use span.Equals instead of string.Compare in JumpTables #55724
    Perf, community-contribution, area-routing, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resource not found in .NET 9 when xaml-comp is false #22536
  • MauiIcon Color has no effect #22534
  • NTLM does not always work properly on all platforms with MAUI with SocketsHttpHandler #22533
  • [Android & iOS]: In ListView with IsPullToRefreshEnabled enabled the PullToRefresh activity indicator remains stuck and doesnt get closed in .net 8 MAUI #22532
  • MAUI Toolkit DrawingView works fine in Debug mode but crashes in Release mode (Android) #22531
  • Custom view as FlyoutIcon in Shell #22530
  • Lottie animations (SKLottieView) do not render inside CollectionView.EmptyView on both iOS and Android #22529
  • [iOS] Label with specified LineHeight gets cut from top #22528
  • An error occurred trying to accept Android SDK licenses. #22527
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22525
    Backlog
  • Android.Views.InflateException when trying to migrate a SearchBar custom renderer #22522
  • ImageButton Padding resizes image down unexpectedly even when there is available space #22521
    Backlog
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space #22520
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.NotImplementedInReferenceAssemblyException #22519
  • Frame + Shadow ignores TapGestureRecognizer #22518
  • ImageButton Aspect is incorrect on Windows #22517
  • [MAC OS] SNMP Socket Permission Issues #22516
  • Newly installed VS 2022 In combination with Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compativility leads to The type or namespace name 'MauiWinUIApplication' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui' #22515
  • Consider rounding numbers in `TransformationExtensions` #22513

Closed

  • RadioButton: TextColor for plain Content not working on iOS #18011
    Backlog
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode (second attempt) #19469
  • [Android] Optimize the package by removing the unnecessary runtimes when publishing #14646
  • DisposeAsync() on IJSObjectReference causes hanging when called on Android 11 and lower on app suspension #13529
    9.0-rc1
  • Maui usage of Glide is preventing us from using our own model loaders #22465
  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 (VS 2022 17.9.6) The app has been terminated when start debugging #22330
  • [XamlC] Improve code generated for x:Array #20745
    .NET 9 Planning
  • FlexLayout trigger Cycle GUI exception #9075
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Mac Catalyst] ApplicationTitle is not setting correctly #15717
  • MacCatalyst container temporary file will disappear #22512
  • [MacCatalyst] Poor scroll performance in MAUI ListView #12388
  • App did not automatically reflect changes to the label #22331
  • [Android] Deleting an item from the CollectionView takes a long time #22190

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Trimming] Remove feature switch which is not necessary anymore #22524
    area-xaml

Merged

  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • [XC] Fix LogWarningOrError #22454
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [X] generate less IL for x:Array #21615
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, Under Consideration
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, stale, area-controls-dialog, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum to string conversion is not respected inside anonymous object in a set operation #33770
  • How to fix `The 'X' property 'Y' on entity type 'Z' is configured with a database-generated default` warnings for existing database? #33769
  • Remove LINQ usage to reduce application size, #33766
    Backlog
  • Global query filter not parameterised #33765
  • System.ExecutionEngineException or System.NullReferenceException in DetectChanges #33763
  • A question about the use of AddDbContextPool #33762

PullRequests

Created

  • Set publishAssetsImmediately on post-build #33768
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.39.1 to 3.40.0 #33767
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [TINY] Move all query translators into their own folders #33755

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Remove invalid optimization of CASE-WHEN expressions #33754
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33746
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
